title: Doccano not working with windows 10
body:
How to reproduce the behaviour
---------
I've cloned the repo like below,

$ git clone https://github.com/doccano/doccano.git
$ cd doccano

After, I've installed docker and after installation I've used this command to run as per the documentation,

$ docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up

After I've checked http://0.0.0.0/ and it's not working.

Here's my traceback, can someone help on why can't I access it?

```
(base) PS E:\user> git clone https://github.com/doccano/doccano.git
Cloning into 'doccano'...
remote: Enumerating objects: 9364, done.
remote: Total 9364 (delta 0), reused 0 (delta 0), pack-reused 9364
Receiving objects: 100% (9364/9364), 44.53 MiB | 296.00 KiB/s, done.
Resolving deltas: 100% (6530/6530), done.
(base) PS E:\user> cd doccano
(base) PS E:\user\doccano> docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up

Creating network "doccano_network-frontend" with the default driver
```

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
*   Operating System: Windows 10
*   Python Version Used: 3.7.7
